original_text: No, I strike a blow to my body and make it my slave so that after I have preached to others, I myself will not be disqualified for the prize.
korean_text: 내가 내 몸을 쳐 복종하게 함은 내가 남에게 전파한 후에 자신이 도리어 버림을 당할까 두려워함이로다

sentences.original_text: No, I strike a blow to my body
so that after I have preached to others
I myself will not be disqualified for the prize
sentences.korean_translation: 나 자신이 상품 자격을 잃지 않기 위함입니다
